@_UI_STD_INIT_@ [if !session admin] [or !session logged_in] [then] [set ui_error]Must be logged in as admin.[/set] [bounce page="__UI_BASE__/error"] [/then] [/if] [if cgi ui_template_version] [include include/page_save] [if cgi ui_page_preview] [calc] if($Config->{ImageDirOriginal}) { $Config->{ImageDir} = $Config->{ImageDirOriginal}; $Config->{ImageDirSecure} = $Config->{ImageDirSecureOriginal}; } return; [/calc] [include file="[scratch ui_output_page]"] [elsif cgi ui_page_finalize] [bounce page="__UI_BASE__/page"] [/elsif] [else] [tmp junkref][area href=__UI_BASE__/page_edit form=auto ui_page="[cgi ui_page]" ][/tmp] [bounce href="[scratch junkref]"] [/else] [/if] [else] [include include/page_save_old] [bounce page="__UI_BASE__/page"] [/else] [/if]
